name: Tree Stump Fever
description:
Maintain your groovy disco cabin in the woods. Protect it from all the woodland creatures. Cut down trees to keeps its health up, and find Fever Trees to give you that righteous dance fever fuel!

Keyboard (1P only): [WASD] moves, [J] dances, [K] hits, [L] picks up, [I] drops

Game Controller (1p-4P): [Directional Pad] moves, [Y] dances, [B] hits, [A] picks up, [X] drops

Cut down trees, throw your wood in the bin, and groove around the disco floor with all four Ashleys to unleash a powerful desperation attack. Careful with it though, you'll burn up all your Fever Fuel!
